column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I have only eaten here for dinner
column2: so I cannot say how it is for lunch.  I typically order a couple of my favorite tapas and one or two new things I have never tried each time I go.  They now have some even smaller tasting tapas called pintxos
column3: and if you are really hungry you can order the larger paella rice dish.  if you get the Paella
column4: order it right away since it takes quite a while to get - and there is a minimum order of two
column5: so if you really want to get this
column6: make sure you are going with someone else that wants it also.
